document.docAuthor: Beyarslan, Ahmet, Gadallah, Neveen S. & Ghahari, Hassan
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalogue of the Iranian Microtypinae and Rogadinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalogue of the Iranian Microtypinae and Rogadinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Iran .
Fars (
Lashkari Bod et al . 2011
), Golestan (
Ghahari et al . 2009
as
Rogas circumscriptus Nees, 1834
), Guilan , Mazandaran (
Farahani et al . 2015
), Ilam (
Ghahari et al . 2011c
), Kerman (Abdolalizadeh et al. 2017), West Azarbaijan (Rastegar et al . 2012), Iran (no specific locality) ( Telenga 1941 as
Rhogas circumscriptus
; Shenefelt 1975 ; Fallahzadeh & Saghaei 2010 ).

General distribution. Palaearctic. Albania , Caucasia, North Africa
, Romania, Siberia ( Shenefelt 1975 ), Armenia, Azerbaijan, China,
Croatia , Faero Islands
, Georgia, Greece, France, Iceland, Ireland, Kazakhstan, Korea, Latvia, Lithuania, Moldova, Mongolia, Poland, Russia, Serbia, Tajikistan, Tunisia, former Yugoslavia (
Yu et al. 2012
), Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Germany, Hungary, Finland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Slovakia, Spain,
Sweden (
Yu et al . 2012
;
van Achterberg
& Shaw 2016)
, England,
Scotland ( Shenefelt 1975 ;
Broad et al. 2016
;
van Achterberg
& Shaw 2016)
,
Ireland (
Yu et al. 2012
;
Broad et al. 2016
;
van Achterberg
& Shaw 2016), Lichtenstein (
van Achterberg
& Shaw 2016)
,
Wales (
Broad et al. 2016
;
van Achterberg
& Shaw 2016)
,
Switzerland (
Yu et al. 2012
; van Achterberg 2014)
, Turkey (
Yu et al . 2012
; Beyarslan 2015 ).
